summary: Hi everyone this is my first save putting on the nexus place so hope you enjoy the save. You also need SKE.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Hi everyone this is my first save putting on the nexus place so hope you enjoy the save. You also need SKE. Put in the comments what you think of Pixie or if you need help. Changed the file and you will start in whiterun. enjoy the save will be making her as a follower soon.


[/size] 
[size=3][u][b]Profile[/b][/u] 

Race: Human 

Age: 20
 
Bio: Lived on a farm with her mum and dad. As the sun went down the vampires came out in to the farm. Her dad went out because he saw someone so Pixies mum took her and hid her in under the bed by the way she was 8 when this happen. And her mum followed the dad with a axe they was both killed by a vampire and Pixie saw him. So she grow up with the family in Riften her grandma. When she got older she be came an assassin for the dawngarud and then she found out that vampires was in Whiterun.

 [b][u][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]requirements [/font][/u][/b]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D6709&pUp=1][size=3]UNP Body[/size][/url][size=3] Get the V1dot2 base main.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D37900&pUp=1][size=3]UNP Blessed Body [/size][/url][size=3]Get the main file but install the UNP body first then the UNP Blessed Body after.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D53996&pUp=1][size=3]HDT Physics Extensions - HDT Physics Extensions[/size][/url][size=3] Just get the main file.


[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33097/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D33097&pUp=1][size=3]Crawl on fours animation - Crawl on fours[/size][/url][size=3] Choose which one you want.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16424/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D16424&pUp=1][size=3]Amiella Outfit - UNP and UNPB [/size][/url][size=3]Choose which one.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1][size=3]ApachiiSkyHair - [/size][/url][size=3]Main file.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D26800&pUp=1][size=3]【Skeleton】XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/size][/url][size=3] Choose one of the main files. after you installed the UNP blessed body then install this.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D32986&pUp=1][size=3]Mature Skin[/size][/url][size=3] Choose one of the UNP Main file. Install first then the Fantasy Heroine.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50914/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50914&pUp=1][size=3]Fantasy Heroine - [/size][/url][size=3]Choose one but you need to install first Mature Skin then install this.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D29624&pUp=1][size=3]Race menu [/size][/url][size=3]Choose the top main file.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57859/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D57859&pUp=1][size=3]Skyrim - Enhanced Camera [/size][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D7887&pUp=1][size=3]Pretty Face - Pretty Face[/size][/url][size=3] Download the main file and install in then download go right to the bottom then install UNP Neck Patch 1_8
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50301/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D50301&pUp=1]
[/url]
author: Joshua Smith
